headline: This Veterans Day, Veterans and Reservists Make Up ComEd’s Latest Market Development Initiative Training Cohort
summary: CHICAGO, November 11, 2025--This Veteran’s Day, 11 veterans and reservists were among the 13 participants graduating from ComEd’s latest Market Development Initiative (MDI) training cohort. Launched in early 2024, MDI provides five weeks of immersive training to help individuals obtain the skills necessary to compete for jobs in the energy-efficiency industry.
